text: I Am Belfast is a 2015 documentary film about Belfast, directed by Mark Cousins. ==Reception== The film holds a 100% approval rating on Rotten Tomatoes based on 17 critical reviews.https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/i_am_belfast ==References== ==External links== * Category:British documentary films Category:British films Category:Films set in Belfast Category:Documentary films about cities Category:Works about Northern Ireland Category:Films directed by Mark Cousins Category:2015 films Category:Films scored by David Holmes (musician)
title: I Am Belfast
